attributes.description:
The Volkswagen Polo tsi feels tough, solid and well built. You get the feeling that it is built to last and survive the harsh conditions in South Africa. The Polo Vivo rides well and is competent even on the roughest of tarmac. The boot space is to be commended and there’s plenty of room for cargo.
Features of this vehicle include but are not limited to ABS Brakes, Air-Conditioning, Alloy Wheels, Bluetooth Connectivity, Central Locking, Front Electric Windows, Power Steering, Radio/CD Player and USB Input.

Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock.
A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further.
Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!

attributes.description:
The indestructible Land Cruiser 70 series surrenders to no challenge; it is steadfast and bold. This range of vehicles is built to perform and work as hard as you do, which is why they have been at the helm of 4x4 African motoring for more than 60 years. Tackle the toughest terrain with ease behind the wheel of the Land Cruiser 70 series.

Features include but are not limited to Traction Control, Auto Lights, Alloy Wheels, Air Conditioner, Electric Windows, Radio, Aux, Bluetooth, Air Bags, Side Impact Protection, Central Locking, On Board Computer, Cloth Interior, Security System, Immobiliser, Power Steering, Impact Tensioning Seat Belts, ABS, EBD Hi Level Brake Light, Body Colored Bumper and Body Colored Mirrors.
